metadata.title: CVE-2024-36900 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  net: hns3: fix kernel crash when devlink reload during initialization  The devlink reload process will access the hardware resources, but the register operation is done before the hardware is initialized. So, processing the devlink reload during initialization may lead to kernel crash.  This patch fixes this by registering the devlink after hardware initialization.
